trackCensoredName: iRelease: Guided meditation to relieve stress and increase energy instantly
releaseNotes: Disable the autolock of the iphone
trackName: iRelease: Guided meditation to relieve stress and increase energy instantly
description:
Are you sick and tired of being run by your emotions?

With the iRelease app, you can choose to dissolve your stress and other negative emotions right on the spot, so you’re in charge of your emotions—instead of your emotions being in charge of you!

Live the vibrant, successful life you’ve always wanted by welcoming your natural ability to let go of those debilitating feelings of frustration, anxiety, depression, self-doubt, confusion and more… And let relaxation, aliveness, creativity, ease and happiness be your everyday experience.

The simple, gentle process featured in this app is The Sedona Method®, the world-renowned process for letting go or “releasing” negative emotions developed by Lester Levenson in 1974, further developed by Hale Dwoskin, Sedona Training Associates, and used by hundreds of thousands of people around the world for over 40 years.

Achieve real and lasting results like these:
• Enjoy higher self-esteem and self-confidence
• Feel calm, centered and focused throughout your day
• Stay positive and motivated towards your goals
• Experience productive action with greater ease
• Unwind naturally and get a good night’s sleep
• Have greater peace of mind and an inner sense of well-being

Convenient, easy listening, perfect for rejuvenating breaks throughout your day, the guided meditations are 3 - 6 minutes in length in either male or female voice. They are harmoniously complemented by the beautifully animated lotus Breath Pacer. Breathing in a calm, natural way allows for greater relaxation and focus, and spontaneous effortless release.

“Using the Sedona Method has transformed my life. Nothing less. I have let go of fear, self-doubt and limiting beliefs, and increased my ability to feel joy, love and peace of mind beyond words.” M. S., Denmark

“I’ve been able to release cravings for certain foods, and am able to fall asleep without the aid of pills.” P. W., Rio de Janeiro

"I had the great good fortune of ‘test driving’ this app recently and was astounded by the swiftness of the release and sense of openness and expansion resulting from simply listening to and following a series of simple and clear prompts and inquiries.

With this app, focus is so easy and effortless.  It is like a laser cutting to the core of the feelings that spontaneously arise. The variety of topics addresses the most common challenges that life brings to distract us from being at peace. The length of the releases make it convenient to excuse oneself from a meeting or situation, as needed; long enough to listen to a track and return to a place of spaciousness allowing for a calmer response or to settle down on-the-spot.

The beauty of iRelease is its infinite value for experienced releasers and non-releasers alike. As a therapist, I see this app as a readily accessible and effective resource to enhance anyone’s journey to wholeness and freedom." Sara Wasserman, MA, LPC, Long Beach, California 

Tim McCavitt, founder of Sedona Releasing Worldwide, is a Sedona Method Licensed Instructor. Based in Sedona, Arizona he teaches seminars and coaches clients worldwide. The Sedona Method has been an integral part of his life since 1978; he worked with Lester Levenson for many years.

Annrika James, co-founder of Sedona Releasing Worldwide, is a Sedona Method Licensed Instructor. She has been practicing The Sedona Method since 1976 when she met Lester Levenson, working closely with him for 16 years as one of the first Sedona Method Instructors. She teaches seminars internationally with her husband, Tim, and coaches clients worldwide.
